data.title: Sr AEM Consultant Resume Sunnyvale, CA
data.meta_description: 6.7 years of CMS domain experience - AEM 6, AEM 6.1, AEM 6.2 and HP Autonomy Interwoven TeamSite, SitePublisher, LiveSite, Workflow(Templates/Modeler) OpenDeploy, DataDeploy. Have done and learnt the CQ development Articles from AEM Community page like Creating the AEM workflows Steps, Submitting Mobile form Data to CQ, Based on Sling Servlets etc.Interacting with the AEM community for building up my CQ skills and helped in solving the questions from AEM forums page.
data.text:
SUMMARY:

6.7 years of CMS domain experience - AEM 6, AEM 6.1, AEM 6.2 and HP Autonomy Interwoven TeamSite, SitePublisher, LiveSite, Workflow(Templates/Modeler) OpenDeploy, DataDeploy.

Have done and learnt the CQ development Articles from AEM Community page like Creating the AEM workflows Steps, Submitting Mobile form Data to CQ, Based on Sling Servlets etc.

Interacting with the AEM community for building up my CQ skills and helped in solving the questions from AEM forums page.

I have developed expertise in AEM Forms.

Experienced in AEM and associated technologies like Sling, OSGI, Felix, JCR, and CRX.

Having Knowledge in CQ5 foundational concepts, including the CRX repository, the CQ5 platform, the use of core frameworks such as Apache Sling and Apache Felix.

Excellent work experience in AEM environment setup, Template Development, Component Development, creating and building Mobile Apps, etc.

Good hands on experience of Sightly HTML Templating language.

Good understanding of all AEM building blocks including templates, components, dialogs (both Classical & Touch-UI), design dialogs etc.

Experience in Web Content Management to create templates, custom components, Bundles.

Experience in implementing Web application, Web Content Management (WCM) and Digital Asset Management (DAM) solutions using Day CQ5 platform.

Excellent understanding of Workflows & creating custom workflow steps in AEM.

Good Understanding of AEM ecommerce Integration Framework.

Good knowledge of AEM Administration like user and group management, permissions, packaging, etc.

Good understanding of Web Content Management.

Application development using Apache Sling and OSGI bundles.

Involved in development of various templates, reusable components using AEM 6.1.

Having good experience with JAVA, J2EE, Servlets, JSPs, JDBC, XML and Oracle, MySQL.

Experienced in development, testing, analysis, estimation, team building & team handling.

Exposure to SDLC (Agile) methodology.

Integrate AEM with AngularJS 2.

Exposure to Quality Standards, procedures and processes.

Proficient in using various IDEs like CRXDE, CRXDE-Lite and Eclipse.

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

Operating Systems: MS Windows XP/7, RHEL, Solaris

Languages/Scripts: Java, J2EE, C, C++, Java Script, jQuery, HTML 5, Perl, Sightly

Tools: AEM 6, AEM 6.1, AEM 6.2, TeamSite/OpenDeploy/DataDeploy

Database: MS-SQL Server, Oracle

J2EE Technologies: Servlet, JSP, JDBC and JNDI

XML Technologies: XML, XSLT, XSD

IDE: Eclipse, CRXDE Lite, Brackets

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:

Confidential, Sunnyvale, CA

Sr AEM Consultant

Technologies: AEM 6.0, DAM, Forms, AEM Tagging, Apache Maven, Sightly, Linux, Jenkins, Workflow, etc.

Responsibilities:

Involved in understanding and analyzing the business requirements

Enhancing the component as per the requirements.

Customized roll-outs in MSM to overcome issues with paths.

Updated Forms, Forms pages to set UTM parameters as Cookies so they can be used in Eloqua. Also involved in Form Re-designs.

Created workflow process steps.

Created custom widget for syncing DAM assets.

Overlay SiteAdmin actions like Page Activation.

Confidential, Delhi

AEM Consultant

Technologies: AEM 6.1, DAM, AEM Tagging, Scene7, Apache Maven, Sightly, AJAX, log4j, Linux, Jenkins, GIT.

Responsibilities:

Involved in understanding and analyzing the business requirements

Integrated the AEM with Scene7.

Develop the REST service to provide content to DemandWare.

Implemented MSM to support different locale-language sites content

Designed and developed the organization of client libraries and created template components using inheritance.

Developed Workflow components related to digital assets upload Workflow (documents and videos) as per the client requirements.

Extensive use of CQ Tag Libraries in the components.

Using AEM 6.1, created Mobile App POC.

Confidential

Sr Technical Consultant

Technologies: AEM 5.6, Java/ J2EE, CRX, JCR, JSP, Servlets, Ajax, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, JSON.

Responsibilities:

Lead all CQ5 related design and framework development using templates, components widgets, CQ5 bundle, JCR/Sling API, clustering publish and author and editing content with the help of OOTB widgets.

Implemented REST-full practices while designing and developing components.

Designed and developed the organization of client libraries and created template components using inheritance.

Developed Workflow components related to digital assets upload Workflow (documents and videos) as per the client requirements.

Extensive use of CQ Tag Libraries in the components.

Customized Dialogs for all the components for providing various options to authors while creating.

Develop digital consumer experiences based on foundation of the Adobe CQ/AEM product suite, including CQ/AEM, CRX, CQ WCM.

Translate marketing and web site needs into AEM specific recommendations and solutions.

Work in an agile, rapid development, and prototyping environment

Confidential

TeamSite Developer

Technologies: HP Autonomy Interwoven TeamSite, SitePublisher, LiveSite, Workflow(Templates/Modeler) OpenDeploy, DataDeploy, Eclipse, JIRA, Servlets, JSP, HTML 5.

Responsibilities:

Involved in understanding and analyzing the business requirements

Design and development of TeamSite templates, components widget, etc.

Developing DCTs, presentation templates, etc.

Creating custom LiveSite components based on business requirement.

Developing Custom TeamSite workflow.

Involved in content authoring, creating the LiveSite pages, User and Group Management, etc.

Unit testing and bug fixes.

Confidential

Technical Consultant

Technologies: HP Autonomy Interwoven TeamSite, SitePublisher, LiveSite, Workflow(Templates/Modeler) OpenDeploy, DataDeploy,Eclipse, JIRA, Servlets, JSP, HTML 5.

Responsibilities:
